```{r, results = 'hide', message = FALSE, echo = F}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)

data <- read_table("ftp://aftp.cmdl.noaa.gov/products/trends/co2/co2_annmean_mlo.txt",skip = 57, col_names = c("year","mean","unc"))

ggplot(data, aes(year, mean)) +
  geom_line(color = "red")
```
```{r, results = 'hide', message = FALSE, echo = F}
top10 <- data %>%
  arrange(desc(mean)) %>%
  top_n(mean, n = 10)

top10 %>%
  kable() %>%
  as_image(width = 10, file = "table.png")
```
